ESN.__init__¶

__init__(self,
W: np.ndarray=None,
resSize: int=400,
xn: list=[0,4,-4],
pn: list=[0.9875, 0.00625, 0.00625],

Parameters
W

User can provide custom reservoir matrix.

resSize

Number of units (nodes) in the reservoir.
